update.description:
12/24/2015 Update: 1. NEW: High DPI support 2. NEW: Add "GenerateUpdateXML" to automate update xml generation 3. FIXED: Title bar available pixels calculation logic 4. FIXED: Text length calculation logic 5. FIXED: Unable to jump back to the current location after deleting all bookmarks
12/24/2015 更新： 1. 新增：支持高DPI 2. 新增：新增"GenerateUpdateXML"以自动生成更新xml文件 3. 修复：计算标题栏像素长度的逻辑 4. 修复：计算字符串像素长度的逻辑 5. 修复：删除所有书签后无法跳转到当前进度的问题
